item.title: INTUIT INC 10-K
item.description: INTUIT INC, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 08, 2021 had 39892 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 417 instances tax - 366 instances financial - 330 instances may - 313 instances fiscal - 305 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
